lead_paragraph: The Force India Formula One team have taken on 16-year-old Russian Nikita Mazepin, whose billionaire father Dmitry is owner of mineral fertiliser producer Uralchem, as a development driver.

headline.print_headline: Russian Teen Joins Force India in Development Role
headline.main: Russian Teen Joins Force India in Development Role
